WorkItem.ClosedComment: Trinket proc has value currently when equipped in most recent commit, mana restore from trinket working correctly
WorkItem.Description: Ephemeral Snowflake is in the item database but doesn't show up when I try to equip it in a trinket slot. I've tried editing the entry but I can't figure out how to make RAWR allow me to equip it and calculate it's value for item comparisons.

Comments.Message: I've set all the filters do display all items (included every instance/pvp/crafted/badge/etc.) and disabled any of the exclusion filters (BoP/iLvl) and this trinket doesn't show up when I click on the trinket slot.
It's very likely that this trinket is not modeled for your model. As described in the bug report posting guidelines, please give us all the data we need, such as the model.

Title: [Restoration Shaman] Ephemeral Snowflake (Trinket) does not display as a selectable item
Description: I am unable to equip the Ephemeral Snowflake trinket.
Steps to Reproduce: 
Launch Rawr 
Load my Retoration Shaman
Attempt to replace the Mithril Pocketwatch in Trinket slot 1 with Ephemeral Snowflake
The trinket is not among the selectable items
Additional Information: 
Rawr v2.3.4
Windows 7 Home Premium
This proc is annoyingly complex, but should be in shortly.
